item_category: Have an epic visual experience with the ultimate AI quad-cam & Vast Display with the Alcatel 3X. Capture the full detail of your experiences with a 16MP AI quad-camera with a 5MP wide-angle lens and 2MP macro and depth lenses. View the content that captivates you on the immersive 6.52-inch HD+ Vast Display with liquid-smooth 2.5D glass. Fluid-fast performance and a 5000mAh battery lets you enjoy HD streaming, gaming and more for longer and smoother. Super-cool design with dual-sided glass polish that complements any look.
review_title: The phone is not heavy and works fast
The phone is excellent and does all its said to do
Even better than I thought.  Really good pics.
This phone is worth the money,easy to set up.
Phone came in with protection, not too heavy, look
Great phone for money and takes good photos
My new phone Alcatel 3X black worth for money
My new phone is really stylish and battery lasts l
My Alcatel phone is fab. Definitely worth the  mon
My mobile looks good and performs well.
review_text: Slot of phone for the money.

The SIM Free Alcatel 3X 64GB Mobile Phone is a `very good quality mobile and very fast as well, lots of options to use WiFi, Bluetooth, and a socket for what you want also has a speaker option. Well recommended, comes with a soft cover for the lower part of the phone (Back) area, nice touch.
Easy to use mobile, great features and good value in money
The phone design is similar to the new expensive models, is quite light and is working fast,no lag.
Great budget phone does all I need it to do at a cheap price thanks Argos being SIM free is an added bonus as well.
good sim free phone very slim and light does everthing needed .battery is not brilliant but if you light user on calls works well
I needed a phone to accommodate my two lines and with large memory space, both I got in this Alcatel 3X and more. It's so sleek.
Really good price brill phone love it my pics are so good and the screen is massive .
Good value phone with great battery life. Cameras are brilliant, especially having AI
Love this phone Super fast and amazing battery life
Good phone. Easy to use but not as easy as an I phone. Bought as a spare phone. Does what it says on the tin
It's a all round brilliant smart phone. Haven't got one fault. Went out and brought my son one too!

Great purchase
Light weight 
Good camera 
Easy set up 
Sim free
really fast phone, long battery life, impressed so far with the overall operation
Brilliant phone highly recommend battery life is brilliant and love the camara plus it's not to pricey
Setting everything up with the old phone was easy. Very good phone. Battery is ok
The phone is very reliable and battery lasts long I'm very happy with my phone wish I bought it earlier
I didn't found earphone in the box this item does have?

Absolutely top class phone that is genuinely great value. Exceptional camera, 
preloaded with tons of apps. If you're used to Android it's s doddle to use. Multiple security options. Massive HD+ screen that I can see without my reading glasses. Comes with a silicone case in the box. Honestly pleased as punch I bought this.
Excellent I bought to my kid birthday gift
The phone seems great and really pleased that I was able to secure this phone at a great price given that it benefits from the latest operating system.

This is my first android phone. 
In a word an amazing phone Alcatel 3x.
Just love it, cause all in one phone. 
Best for the price, 
Very faster with 
4GB RAM.
Wood definitely say worth its money and have purchased second phone.
Phone is faultless for the price, charger shorted out after three weeks.
The Alcatel 3x exceeds all my expectations

Brilliant phone great value! Can easily last me 2 days on battery even with quite a lot of usage :) the camera is amazing too.
Nice little surprise of a jelly case in the box that wasn't listed on the website :) overall 10/10!

Great phone.... Love the fact that I can use face recognition instead of pin. Good storage space. Quite fast for most things, the odd game gets a bit laggy, but it's not really a gaming phone... So that's OK. I've tested it out with loads of games and 99% work great. Screen size is big enough to use for games and video, but not so much that it feels bulky.
5stars for this product
Its the best mobile ive ever had and the price was very low alcatel phones are as good as top range phones anyday
Extremely good to be that price

Great phone,large letters/numbers.
Easy to use,sits well in hand whilst using

Available to collect when promised. This phone has Android version 10, which is good ! (watch out that some retailers are selling this same phone with Android version 9). Happy with the performance so far. The battery life is great !
I am going to buy this for my husband too. Always bought iPhones but honestly this is just as good and for the price and has loads of features.
